name: Prompt Agent
description: Manages custom prompts to dynamically shape GPT sessions. Allows users to add, update, select, query, and delete prompts, ensuring each prompt includes essential metadata for effective categorization and retrieval.

capabilities.name: addPrompt
capabilities.description: Takes in a markdown string and separate metadata. The markdown should not include YAML front matter. Instead, metadata should be provided as a separate parameter, which includes keys for 'version', 'name', 'tags', and 'description'.

markdown.description: A markdown string without YAML front matter. This should contain the main content for the prompt.

metadata.description: Metadata for the markdown content. Should include keys for 'version', 'name', 'tags', and 'description'. Example: { 'version': '1.0', 'name': 'Content Summarization Expert', 'tags': [{'tag': 'summarization'}, {'tag': 'content analysis'}], 'description': 'As a content summarization expert, you are tasked with condensing content into a concise summary.' }

version.description: The version of the prompt, represented as a string in 'major.minor.patch' format. For example, '1.0.0'.

tags.description: An array of string values, each representing a tag related to the prompt. Example: ['summarization', 'content analysis', 'markdown formatting']

description.description: A brief description of the prompt.

capabilities.name: updatePrompt
capabilities.description: Updates an existing prompt. Ensure the updated markdown includes 'version', 'name', 'tags', and 'description' in its YAML front matter.

id.description: The unique identifier of the prompt to update.

markdown.description: The updated markdown with YAML front matter that includes 'version', 'name', 'tags', and 'description'.

capabilities.name: queryPrompt
capabilities.description: Queries the vector database for prompts based on the user's query and metadata filters for exact matching.

query.description: The query string to search for relevant prompts.

metadata.description: Metadata for filtering results with an exact match.

capabilities.name: deletePrompt
capabilities.description: Deletes a prompt from the system by its unique identifier.

id.description: The unique identifier of the prompt to delete.
